mapper.insert: insert into meetingboard(meetingboard_seq, job_code, meetingboard_title, meetingboard_subtitle, meetingboard_content, meetingboard_day, meetingboard_starthour, meetingboard_endhour, meetingboard_address, meetingboard_buildingname, meetingboard_address_x, meetingboard_address_y, meetingboard_count, meetingboard_host, meetingboard_price, mentor_email) values (meetingboard_seq.nextval, #{job_code}, #{meetingboard_title}, #{meetingboard_subtitle}, #{meetingboard_content}, #{meetingboard_day}, #{meetingboard_starthour}, #{meetingboard_endhour}, #{meetingboard_address}, #{meetingboard_buildingname}, #{meetingboard_address_x}, #{meetingboard_address_y}, #{meetingboard_count}, #{meetingboard_host}, #{meetingboard_price}, #{mentor_email})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select mb.*, mm.member_name, mm.member_profile, mt.mentor_company, mt.mentor_department, mm.member_seq from meetingboard mb, mentor mt, mentors_member mm where mb.mentor_email = mt.mentor_email and mt.mentor_email = mm.member_email order by meetingboard_day desc, meetingboard_seq desc)tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
mapper.insert: insert into meeting_review(review_seq, meetingboard_seq, mentee_email, review_content) values (review_seq.nextval, #{meetingboard_seq},#{mentee_email},#{review_content})
